channel.title: How to I make wildy obelisks?
channel.description: I really need working wildy obelisks. How can i do this? Thanks to all that help.

item.title: How to I make wildy obelisks?
item.dc:creator: @Bulletthrust Bulletthrust
item.description:
@Bulletthrust wrote:

Wildy obelisks do not have a object id, there part of the map, how do i make it so when i click it it teles me somewhere, because there is no object id for it.

Read full topic
item.source: How to I make wildy obelisks?

item.title: How to I make wildy obelisks?
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

Bulletthrust:

Wildy obelisks as in the thing you click to teleport you around the wild, the differnt glowing purple obelisks lol? every private server has them but mine dont work.

Oh, well then you just need to edit your object clicking case.

Open client.java, search for:

case 132:

Add this just before the case break:

if ( objectID == *obeliskobjID* ) 
{
    // Change these coordinates to whatever you want
    teleportToX = 1234;
    teleportToY = 4321;
}

If you have Delta, or if your teleport method is just something else, you’ll have to rename the one that’s in that code to prevent from getting errors.

Read full topic
item.source: How to I make wildy obelisks?
